description: Configuration profiles, policies, and CSP/GPO settings

group_policy_registry.query: SELECT name, type, data FROM registry WHERE path LIKE 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Policies\%' AND data != '';

mdm_configuration_policies.query: SELECT name, type, data FROM registry WHERE path LIKE 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\PolicyManager\%' AND name != '';

windows_defender_policies.query: SELECT name, type, data FROM registry WHERE path LIKE 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Windows Defender\%' AND data != '';

firewall_policies.query: SELECT name, type, data FROM registry WHERE path LIKE 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\WindowsFirewall\%' AND data != '';

update_policies.query: SELECT name, type, data FROM registry WHERE path LIKE 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Windows\WindowsUpdate\%' AND data != '';

bitlocker_policies.query: SELECT name, type, data FROM registry WHERE path LIKE 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\FVE\%' AND data != '';

user_account_policies.query: SELECT name, type, data FROM registry WHERE path LIKE 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Policies\System\%' AND data != '';
user_account_policies.description: User account control and security policies

power_management_policies.query: SELECT name, type, data FROM registry WHERE path LIKE 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Power\%' AND data != '';

edge_browser_policies.query: SELECT name, type, data FROM registry WHERE path LIKE 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\%' AND data != '';
